name: Pyrotechnics
description: Choose an area of flame that fits in a 5-foot cube within range. You can extinguish the fire in that area, creating either fireworks (bright light flash and potential blindness) or smoke (heavily obscures a 20-foot cube for 1 minute). Creatures in the fireworks make a Constitution saving throw or are blinded until the end of your next turn; smoke disperses with strong wind.

effects.description: Fireworks: extinguish the flame; each creature in a 10-foot radius makes a Con save or is blinded until end of your next turn.
Smoke: extinguish the flame; create a 20-foot cube of smoke (heavily obscured) for 1 minute, dispersible by strong wind.
